Material used.Description: RNA was extracted from iPSC-derived dopaminergic neurons

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Likely gain-of-function (based on described outcome - further investigation needed)
Readout description.Result Description: qPCR showed significant increase in LRRK2 transcript levels.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Likely gain-of-function (based on described outcome - further investigation needed)
Readout description.Result Description: qPCR showed significant increase in LRRK2 transcript levels.

Biological replicates.Description: Experiments were repeated with three independent cultures.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was measured in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 cDNA was used as a control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Transcript level between X and Y (specific values not provided in the text)

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Transcript level above Z (specific value not provided in the text)
